backend/main.mo: Simple actor storing an achievementPower counter with increment and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping themeâ€‘related requirements to implementation files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying them to root and dark classes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout with header, theme toggle, language selector, and content sections using i18n text.
frontend/src/components/AchievementCount: Component displaying achievement power, handling increment logic, and showing feedback with animations and i18n strings.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles light/dark theme with tooltip and i18n labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useAchievementPower.t: React Query hooks to fetch and increment achievement power via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Simple hook that returns the current theme context and ensures it is used within a ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides an i18n context with language state, initializes it from storage or browser settings, and persists changes.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines translation types and the full English/Japanese translation dictionaries used across the app.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Hook that exposes the current language, setter, and resolved translation object from the i18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom theme variables, typography, and background styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx: Provides theme context with light/dark mode support, syncing theme state to the DOM and storage.
frontend/src/theme/themeStorage.ts: Handles reading, writing, and determining initial theme preference from localStorage or system settings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling class-based dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the IC-based app.
